5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Jabir b. 'Abdullah narrated:Our houses were situated far away from the mosque; we, therefore, decided to sell our houses so that we may be able to come near the mosque. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade us (to do so) and said: There is for every step (towards the mosque) a degree (of reward) for you

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ كَثْرَةِ الْخُطَا إِلَى الْمَسَاجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of taking many steps to the masjid
